title: Noah Alexander
description:
Noah Alexander is an owner of Classic Car Studio, a customization and restoration shop, and the shop in Velocity's show, "Speed is the New Black". They do great work, focusing on speed and clean builds. From vintage 911s to 650HP Chevy C10s, they do it all.


Check out Noah's shop, Classic Car Studio, here: http://www.classiccarstudio.com/speedshop/about/

Check out "Speed is the new Black" on Velocity. More info at https://www.velocity.com/tv-shows/speed-is-the-new-black/about


Get the video version of this show at: https://youtu.be/EXluY_CMhAI


Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @classic_car_studio

Check out our merch!
https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
